headline: J.B. Hunt Joins the Triumph Network
summary: DALLAS, January 22, 2026--J.B. Hunt has joined the Triumph Network, adopting Triumph's advanced automated payment solution to accelerate and streamline carrier payment cycles.

headline: J. B. Hunt Transport Services, Inc. Announces Increase to Quarterly Dividend
summary: LOWELL, Ark., January 22, 2026--J.B. Hunt Transport Services, Inc. (NASDAQ:JBHT) announced today that its Board of Directors has declared a regular quarterly dividend on its common stock of $ 0.45 (forty five cents) per common share, which is a 2.3% increase over the previous quarterly dividend. The dividend is payable to stockholders of record on February 6, 2026 and will be paid on February 20, 2026.

headline: Federal Crackdown Pulls Thousands of Foreign Truckers Off Roads
summary: Trucking companies say Trump administration efforts to limit licenses and enforce English skills could help reverse a downturn due in part to overcapacity.

headline: Jim Cramer Says “When the Freight Market Turns Around, J.B.Hunt Should Be Able to Make a Fortune”
summary: J.B. Hunt Transport Services, Inc. (NASDAQ:JBHT) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently looked at. Cramer discussed the company’s recent quarter during the episode, as he said: Technically, when J.B. Hunt reported, the numbers were indeed mixed.
